name: roastbeet
text: A comment left by roastbeet was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Norsef, ButterMoths, lamboyster, Overmedicated, Deusoma, Manxome, Bielebog, jfenserty, rowboat, syrupykeyboard, TheLoneliestMonkey, NDCaesar, Sargasm, the_dingle, luckypyjamas, rotinajanitor, likeiwassaying, ravindra108, sncether, littlefatdog, ANinasaurusRex, Sabacc)

name: saint
text: It's ok. We all say things that aren't true and make everyone hate us.

name: mr_pete
text: It is an okay strip. I am sad, but I want to say: "Man, it is a hard thing, but you need to get beyond. A bottle is a falsehood."

name: rowboat
text: Yeah, it's sad - but it ain't Circumstances. Regardless, I'm shocked that it got such a low rating.  It's one of only a handful of 5's from me at this early stage of the strip.  Say what you will about this arc, to me it's an early glimpse into what would eventually make this strip great. And Téodor shakily trying to pour more wine when it's obvious that too much has already been poured is among my favorite panels.

name: kotekan
text:
I always figured he was reading the label--like, "Wait, what did I buy? This wine has too much sorry in it."

Also I like how he drains both glasses.

name: mortshire
text: oh god, it's making me FEEL.  *tear*

name: lucid
text:
Yeah, this strip is brutal, in its own way.

Low ratings are not deserved here.

name: nexus
text: Yeah, it's a feely strip

name: evilchick
text: Super sad :(

name: f1shst1ck
text: Ah character development. So painful and poignant

name: tetrisattack
text: Poor T.

name: soilentshuggah
text: Very very serious movie...

name: shoinan
text: Look at that wine go.

name: spinynorman
text: Did that the other night after a date. But it was a good date. I just drink a lot.

name: unsentletter
text: Do you think he really met her or that the first five panels are just a dream sequence?

name: lux
text: Interpretation: yor doin it rong.

name: dtuba
text:
No, it's in the title of the strip. He's waiting for her to show, reheasing all the smooth shit he's gonna say to her, and drinking.
It's a Sad Thing.

name: dtuba
text: Grrr, ReHEARSing. dammit

name: mattylite
text: In the first two panels he does that thing where you make your eyebrows all jaunty to be charming to the ladies.  In the fourth panel he does that thing where you close one eye to try to focus when you drank so much wine.  Then they both close, then they leak because he has feelings.  Shit, wait, that's not a comment, that's like a recap for a blind person.

name: shoinan
text: Yet you still clicked the post button. Chubby for you.

name: thecomedown
text: A blind person who can read? I feel ill.

name: coco
text: Saying "There, there" while patting T's pillow is the highest level of comfort offered by Mr. Bear . . . It's all I would need.

name: rowboat
text: Don't forget the wine.

name: snowman
text: I feel you, Teodor.

name: seph
text: As evident by his wink, a rousing conversation about Rain Man is the key to any successful endeavor with the opposite sex.

name: zapatos
text: I don't know why, but when the last panel exhibits a crying character I instinctivly 5 it.

name: especial
text: Me too!

name: tom-ba
text: Teodor has experienced the saddest thing...

name: astarael
text:
Oh, T.

The saddest thing is that, over the course of the entire strip from this to current, his life has not risen much above this .

(noooo)

name: nigelchaos
text: I like how his hair gets progressively messier.
